title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah Terror Sites in Lebanon: An Inside Look at the Operation”

content.rendered:
IDF spokesperson:

Military sites in which Hezbollah terrorists were operating and terror infrastructures were attacked; the IDF completed an attack in Lebanon.

Fighter jets and combat helicopters attacked a series of Hezbollah’s terror targets in Lebanon.

Among the targets attacked, a launching pad from which rocket launches were performed to our territory, military sites in which the organization’s terrorists operated, and an observation post.

Earlier today, two IDF soldiers were lightly injured from the impact of an “NT” missile near Shatula area. The soldiers were taken for medical treatment, and their families have been informed.

Attached is footage from the attacks: https://bit.ly/3TcWDIg
